report.title: Get surveys for population call.
report.description: Report returns a list of surveys, allowing the surveys list in report parameters to be populated. Note this report has hard-coded survey names, as the system cannot provide parameters to this kind of report. The hard-coded surveys are currently setup for testing and will need adjusting for live.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM surveys s WHERE s.deleted=false AND s.title in ('Epiphytic flora of ash trees in woodlands','Epiphytic flora of ash trees in open habitats') GROUP BY s.id
